markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Heir](/Feats.aspx?ID=3544) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 57</row>

</column>

---

Your affinity for negative energy spills outward and grants you a refilling well of necromantic essence. Once per hour, you can cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) as a 6th-level divine innate spell.
name: Necromantic Heir
